item.title: Apple’s new iPad Pro could get another front-facing camera
item.description: Apple’s upcoming iPad Pro could appease fans of both landscape and portrait mode by including two front-facing cameras. That’s according to a report from Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman, who says Apple is add
